divs: sighting detailsmy exact position is 38.4995���n, 89.9515���w. oddly enough, earlier tonight around 10pm, after watching a dvd documentary called "capturing the light" about one contactee case in canada (dorothy izatt, an 81-year old woman who captured over 30,000 feet of 8mm film of ufos\orbs\lightbeings over 30 years), me and my friend steve went outside for a cigarette. the moment we went out, we both noticed a strange bright light off on the horizon, just about due northwest, hovering off in the distance above the trees. we both initially thought that it was a plane or a star, but the object started to move back and forth, sort of wobbling a bit, before shining so brightly as to outshine the moon for a moment. i have seen plenty of airplanes in my life (i used to work at catholic health association in st. louis and they are right next to the airport so i've seen plenty of aircraft go directly overhead as well). the light wobbled back and forth for a good minute or two, my friend and i standing there transfixed by the object. several times, the light went completely out, to reappear nearby a second or two later. there was definitely a strange, other-worldly feeling while we watched it. it seemed to respond to us in a way, once we stated that it should "do something impressive" and a second or two later, it would light up. also, i noticed that when it lit up brightly, i got a strange electric sensation throughout my body, and my hairs stood on end, like when you touch the van de graaff generator at the fun house. i got excited and went inside to yell to my friend ali to "get outside now!", but i found that when i ran back out, the object went off to the right behind the trees, and dimmed, as if it didn't want my friend ali to see it. she went back inside after a few minutes, and i felt compelled to walk across the street and across a grass field to the edge of a corn field, in the direction of the ufo. i remember thinking to myself "where did you go?", and a moment later, it popped out again from behind the trees, lit up for a second, then dimmed and went back down behind the trees. it was still far away. i'd say the entire time it was a good 5-10 miles away, but it's hard to tell because it was so dark. the most incredible part of the experience was the fact that it seemed to respond to our thoughts and voices, and the light it emitted was of a quality i've never seen before. it was such a bright white as to appear almost blue-ish white. i've been hoping to see an actual ufo, as i have been researching ufos quite a bit lately, and looking at alot of amazing video evidence. but there's no words to describe the real thing. it's such a strange feeling, so compelling as to leave one with no choice but to believe. something is about to happen, i feel. more and more people are seeing lights in the sky, and more video is being captured, and the frequency of sightings seems to be increasing. maybe we are about to finally make contact, and the government coverup will finally end. one can only hope.
